ng-component-lifecycle-hooks.name: ionViewWillEnter
ng-component-lifecycle-hooks.description: Fired when the component routing to is about to animate into view.

ng-component-lifecycle-hooks.name: ionViewDidEnter
ng-component-lifecycle-hooks.description: Fired when the component routing to has _finished_ animating.

ng-component-lifecycle-hooks.name: ionViewWillLeave
ng-component-lifecycle-hooks.description: Fired when the component routing _from_ is about to animate.

ng-component-lifecycle-hooks.name: ionViewDidLeave
ng-component-lifecycle-hooks.description: Fired when the component routing _from_ has _finished_ animating.
